title: Bug 21706 - BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: Bug 21706 - BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
OB: The BidiUtil in the win32 platform uses Class.forName() to achieve a specific functionality.
EB: The BidiUtil in the win32 platform should consider an alternative approach instead of using Class.forName().
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the BidiUtil class in the win32 platform.
2. Locate the line which uses Class.forName().
3. Change the line to: static Callback callback = new Callback(new BidiUtil().getClass(), "windowProc", 4);
4. Test the changes to ensure that the desired functionality is maintained.
